thread.title: Lucknow Development Authority Unveils Ambitious 300-Acre Logistics Park and 15,000 Plots in Varun Vihar Project, ETRealty
thread.title_full: Lucknow Development Authority Unveils Ambitious 300-Acre Logistics Park and 15,000 Plots in Varun Vihar Project, ETRealty

author: www.ETRealty.com
title: Lucknow Development Authority Unveils Ambitious 300-Acre Logistics Park and 15,000 Plots in Varun Vihar Project, ETRealty
text: LUCKNOW: The Lucknow Development Authority (LDA) is planning to develop a 300-acre logistics park as part of its upcoming Varun Vihar scheme on the Agra expressway. Alongside, more than 15,000 residential, commercial and group housing plots will be created, making it one of the largest housing and infrastructure projects in the state capital.LDA vice-chairman Prathamesh Kumar on Wednesday inspected the proposed site and directed officials to speed up land acquisition. During the visit, he met engineers, project officials and farmers at the scheme's site office in Dona village. Kumar said, \"Varun Vihar will not only provide homes to lakhs of families but will also open up new opportunities in employment and investment. We want to develop it on international standards.\"Spanning over 5,610 acre, the scheme will cover land in villages such as Bhalia, Adampur Indwara, Bahru, Jaliyamau, Madarpur, Ibrahimganj, Nakataura, Gehlwara, Tejkrishna Kheda, Revari, Sakra and Dona in Sadar and Sarojininagar tehsils. The logistics park, spread over 300 acre, will be connected directly to the Agra expressway and Kisanpath. The scheme will also have an inter-state bus terminal (ISBT). A major highlight will be the development of nearly 800 acres for green belts, parks and water bodies. An international-level golf course and a central park are part of the plan.Kumar said, \"The project will attract investment in education, healthcare and industry. With the size and scale of Varun Vihar, the scheme will bring in unprecedented development. We are designing it as a self-sustained township.\"
